website_summaries.verdict: This hamper might not look great and may not last a lifetime, but it is very functional.
pros: Great price even for two of them
Easy to store, lightweight and large enough to carry plenty of laundry
cons: Lightweight, mesh fabric prone to tear if too many clothes are put in hamper

customer_reviews.title: Handle may let go if over packed
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hamper for over a year. One handle has come undone on one side. The handle did not rip, the material it was sewn to did not rip, it looks like the stitching from the handle disappeared???? I want to try and hand stitch it with a thicker thread though it may be difficult due to the thickness of the handle material. The other hamper i have is still fine. Honestly it probably let loose due to the over packing that these hampers get on a continuous basis. I put so much clothes in it that i push the close down like garbage in your kitchen garbage pail. Still use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lou From New York

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry bags out there
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Very sturdy and holds two weeks of laundry for me. The handles seem to be attached very strongly to the bag and the best part is the handles don't cut into your hands when you're carrying. They're thick enough and wide enough to ease the pressure. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and spend those extra dollars...
customer_reviews.text: We have had these hampers for a short amount of time. Within the first month of owning, the mesh is already ripping. The size of these are quite small. Perfect for a child maybe, but not great for your average adult. If you have more than 3 pairs of jeans in here, you feel like the bottom may give out. The positive, they are small and fold up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Hamptons

customer_reviews.title: Both broke the first time I tried to use them.
customer_reviews.text: The handle ripped off the first time I picked the hamper up with clothes in it. Since this is a 2 pack I dumped my clothes in the second one and watched the wire pop out of the bottom of the second one. I’m not talking about a heavy load either. It was maybe 2/3 full of miscellaneous clothing items. So both units broke the first time I tried to use them. There’s are poorly made pieces of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: More durable than what I’ve been finding in stores.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a mesh laundry hamper for more than 10 years, and the metal frame was starting to poke the fabric...definitely time for a new one! What I found trying to shop at like Walgreens and Target though is that they just don’t make them the way they did 10 years ago. They seemed even more cheaply made than before. (Aren’t so many things like that though?!) Kind of nervous to buy these without seeing them in person, but they are so much more well-made than what I’ve been seeing in stores!! Love the reinforcements, and the side pockets are a great feature!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy laundry hamper
customer_reviews.text: The laundry hampers come folded up in their packaging. They easily unfold and pop-up into their regular shape. I've used mine for about a month now and I haven't had any issues. The hamper is easy to carry to my apartment's shared laundry space. The hamper is able to hold a full load of clothes and laundry detergent bottle in it without any signs of breaking. I was surprised that it could hold that much weight despite being a cheap hamper.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Durable, perfect for kids rooms and traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for several weeks now. I placed one in each of my children's rooms, and one in each bathroom, they are perfect to fold up and put under my backseat to take to our camper- no more wasted trash bags full of clothes! They keep my kids rooms more cleaned up and traveling is a lot easier and less wasteful. When they fill up I can carry them to our laundry room and carry it right back to their bedrooms. The hampers are a lot more durable than the ones I use to purchase as a young adult and I'm really pleased with them! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: ...very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love mesh hampers because they are so easy to transport to the laundry room or the laundry mat. This one is very sturdy, I love the large side pocket, the handles don't nearly sever your fingers off, it is very well made, easy to fold (though I had a little trouble folding it in a circle) to put it in a closet for storage, and the price was fantastic...getting a few more for gifts and a few college students.
customer_reviews.author: Adelina M. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Strong handles
customer_reviews.text: We put these to the test when we moved my son into his dorm room this weekend. I loaded it with 4 bath towels, 4 hand towels, two sets of twin sheets and a bath caddy with shampoo, body wash, toothpaste and toothbrush. I carried the load by the handles from the third floor of the parking garage and to the fourth floor of the dorm. Thankfully the handles were intact when we finally reached his room. And the bottom was also intact because I dragged it the last few feet to his room. LOL Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: awesome product! Exactly what I want
customer_reviews.text: awesome product! Exactly what I want! easy to handle and folded if you don't use them. I don't test how weight it can handle yet. But I can put all my two weeks' clothes in one hamper. It surprises me. Another good point for this hamper is the side pocket. You can put some of your clothes that you don't want to mix with others in there. I put my work out clothes in there. Anyway, this is an easy to use and easy to hide basket. Especially for small closet or small laundry.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: I wrote their name on each one and when it is time for Mom to pick them up I just take them out of the hamper and put each child's dirty clothes in a bag to take home
customer_reviews.text: These Pop-Up mesh hampers are a life saver when the grandchildren come over. I was so tired of picking up clothes off the floor, but now they have their own individual hamper when they spend the nite. I wrote their name on each one and when it is time for Mom to pick them up I just take them out of the hamper and put each child's dirty clothes in a bag to take home. After they leave they fold up nice and neat and go into the closet until the next visit.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a massage therapist and tote my sheets to/from home for cleaning so I use these hampers every day. They hold up better than any I've used. The handles are woven fabric. They are sturdy, wide and strong. The hamper has a wider opening so loading and unloading is easier too. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L

customer_reviews.title: actually durable
customer_reviews.text: These are actually durable. The stitching is durable. The material is durable. They are hearty. I'm really glad I made this purchase, after getting several SUPER non-durable collapsible hampers at the grocery store over the past few years. These will definitely outlast all of my others.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Moore

customer_reviews.title: Storage foldable pop-up laundry hampers
customer_reviews.text: I love these hampers because they are easy to carry and they keep laundry organized utilizing minimum space. The only drawback on these particular hampers is that they are a little smaller than the ones I had previously, but that is only a slight problem. I would highly recommend these hampers to everyone, because they are easier to handle than the old fashioned laundry basket. They take up less space and are much easier to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: mary lou ceparski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hamper / laundry tote.
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking for something to replace similar hampers I bought many, many years ago in a big-box store. Everything I tried fell apart within a few weeks. Finally, I found these. They are much heftier than other hampers I've tried, and large enough to hold two loads of laundry each. I expect them to last several years in our laundry-heavy household. Folds perfectly flat so I can store them between the dryer and the wall. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: SharonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought many sets of these for my home and just ordered them for my sisters home. VERY Sturdy and convenient to fold if not needed. I had others in the past that ripped easily and these are great!
customer_reviews.author: NBDB

customer_reviews.title: I like the size and the fact that it comes in ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the fact that it comes in a 2 pack, and especially that you can fold it into quarters (so it is the dimension of one side). However, the design of the opening is really poor. It doesn't have a large opening (for whatever reason the hole is smaller than it needs to be), so when I am dumping the clothes from my dryer into the hamper, instead of "sweeping" the clothes with my arm, I have to grab handfuls and force it into the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many other brands of these collapsible hampers and they are worthless. These are amazing and made well. I am very pleased with them. I ordered a second set so I can separate my clothes to take to the laundromat.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mom

customer_reviews.title: The handles are sturdy and the cat has not yet accidentally clawed a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, after about three months (I believe), these are holding up well. The handles are sturdy and the cat has not yet accidentally clawed a large hole into the side of either one. Nice side pocked for things like socks or delicacy bags.
customer_reviews.author: Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these at first. They are a great size and shape and are easy to carry. After a few months, however, they started to get holes in them. The holes grew larger and larger until my clothes started falling out of them. Nine months later, I need to throw them out and find something new.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great for clothes or stuffed animals.
customer_reviews.text: These pop-up storage baskets are great for whatever cloth items you need to put away or store. We use one in my sons room for laundry & the other for my granddaughter stuffed animals.
customer_reviews.author: 4fromTexas

customer_reviews.title: I finally have two matching baskets!!
customer_reviews.text: I always like to keep these in my closet one for the whites one for the colors. These are nice and sturdy and hold more with a wider opening than Others I have used before.
customer_reviews.author: CAA

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are very useful laundry hampers for the kid's rooms. They tuck neatly into a corner and dirty clothes actually make their way into them now. What a concept! My only issue, and it's a very small one, is it's difficult to get them folded back flat once they've been "sprung" if that was ever needed. I need to order another set to throw the dog toys into!
customer_reviews.author: Marsgard

customer_reviews.title: They are Blue not black as I thought, dont buy unless you want blue
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the unexpected color, I wanted black thought these were black but they are blue the item description did not say they were blue. Frustrating, misleading
customer_reviews.author: Rick Allen

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple similar to these but I prefer this brand because they have a nice, sturdy handle and made from a heavier material. There's even a pocket in the front to put your detergent packet into or whatever you like.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Leathers Bangor, Maine

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought several brands of collapsible laundry hampers on Amazon, and these are by far the sturdiest. We tend to overstuff them and then throw them down to the first floor...these are the only ones we've found that can withstand such regular abuse. Awesome, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Haine

customer_reviews.title: These are great pop-up hampers
customer_reviews.text: These are great pop-up hampers. I was looking for one to replace the one we've had for several years and was wearing out from use by us and our cat. I wasn't sure how sturdy these would be, so I was pleasantly surprised to find that these are far from flimsy. I am so glad I bought this set of 2. I would recommend these to anyone for travel, for small spaces, for college students, anyone. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Robin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It folds down to a small size that can be tucked into a bag. It can also be a bag for laundry supplies as well. I used this for laundry but it could also be used for any number of things (ie storage, shred bin, toys, etc.) I'm not sure how this will hold up over time, but it does appear to be well constructed. I'm very happy I found this item. I was looking at other two bin laundry sorting hampers that were twice as much. The seller was also very prompt in sending them to me, which is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Carter

customer_reviews.title: Love this hamper
customer_reviews.text: Bought this years ago and I still have them and use them! They hold alot of laundry and are quite durable for a mesh product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KAT S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I was given my first "pop-up" basket by a neighbor, loved it... So I started looking for more. Bought some at the dollar store and they were terrible! These are great for tight spaces, like behind the door, which is perfect because we do not have a lot of room at our camp. These are very high quality. You just have to remember what they are, you can over pack them and then expect them to perform like a regular laundry basket.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley A

customer_reviews.title: Too Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Although I do use these, they are way to flimsy for me to give a good review. The storage capacity is pretty good, but I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Burns

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Heavy Duty Hampers
customer_reviews.text: These hampers are much better than the ones I found in local stores. Reinforced and heavy duty, made well. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: good4u45

customer_reviews.title: Better than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: I am so thrilled to have ordered these foldable hampers! They are the perfect size for my smaller bathroom not to mention the quality is outstanding! I would purchase over and over again. The each have a pocket for dryer sheets or magazines if you travel to the laundromat. Great for college dorms, etc! Do not hesitate or think twice definitely worth every dime!
customer_reviews.author: Ssho

customer_reviews.title: Contents under pressure!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! This product comes all folded up and secured with elastic. Once you remove the elastic it flies open with gusto. I got smacked in the nose with it and taken very much by surprise! Product appears nicely designed and arrives as expected. The color is navy. I have not used it for long, so I wonder how durable it will be dragging laundry around.
customer_reviews.author: Steph19

customer_reviews.title: They are a good way to pre-sort laundry
customer_reviews.text: We've been using similar mesh hampers for years. They are a good way to pre-sort laundry, and fold up for easy storage. We give them a pretty good workout and ours all needed to be replaced. THESE new hampers are the best we've ever had..strong and looking as though they will last much longer than our other hampers. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Hope Walters

customer_reviews.title: Just ok... It's short term solution
customer_reviews.text: These work good for a while, but I notice that they tear or break down between 6 months to a year. I've had to replace a few sets of these.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo H

customer_reviews.title: Laundry hamper
customer_reviews.text: Used one of them on our last cruise and it kept everything separated from dirty and clean. Was a snap to take to the self serve laundry on board the ship. Held quite a few articles of clothing (almost a weeks worth of clothes for the both of us). I like that it folds down after use and doesn't take up a lot of room either folded or set up.
customer_reviews.author: Hot in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Good for short term storage
customer_reviews.text: Being used to store some clothes in a room that has no closets or dressers. Also, in the bathroom and another bedroom as hampers.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaX6

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We've gone thru several laundry baskets of this style. These are by far the most robust in design.
customer_reviews.author: Delaware Den

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Appears well constructed and made using quality materials. Beyond that it’s a bag for dirty clothes my expectations weren’t that high and it does a excellent job at what it’s designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect size and weight for me to pull my clothes ...
customer_reviews.text: Due to a medical issue, I have problems lifting. These are the perfect size and weight for me to pull my clothes from my room to the utility room. I was surprised to see that they ship in a small box. They arrive folded into perfect small round circles, and pop out perfectly as shown.
customer_reviews.author: TXCamper

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, sturdier than other pop-up hampers I've used. The handles are pretty sturdy as well although I haven't stuffed it to max capacity as of yet. Perfect for when I put off going to the laundromat for too long and need extra baskets!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good for the mesh laundry basket
customer_reviews.text: Very good high-quality laundry basket Would buy it again also the price was right also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great...I was looking for something inexpensive that still worked for laundry. This comes with two hampers, so we use one for clothing and one for wet towels. They are sturdy and have held up well. They stand up very well even when they are empty. I like the pockets on the side to...my husband put his hangers in it and they are easy for me to collect.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Better than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: These hampers are sturdier and more durable than I had imagined. I still use them and they're still in great condition. No tears or rips yet.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: They got these just right.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and a really good size, making it easy to carry up and downstairs to the washer dryer. They stand rigid and upright empty or full.
customer_reviews.author: RichT

customer_reviews.title: great qaulity for the price!
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy handles- although the mesh material could be alittle better and stronger as mine has already ripped on one side. but if your looking for hampers with sturdy handles these are good.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: It is great & packs a punch.
customer_reviews.text: Work great and are exactly what I needed. They hold up pretty well so far. Obviously don't over pack these. Just because you can carry 50 lbs of laundry doesn't mean they can. But be warned. They come coiled like a spring with a small elastic band holding them together. Try pulling the band off to close to yourself and you are going to get hit in the face. Of course that's what I did, and it felt very unpleasant to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Strong with a Nice Big Side Pocket
customer_reviews.text: I have not actually used these yet but the quality is far better than I have found in any store. The handles are strong and I like the large pouch on the side - it's great to put you keys or phone in if you are taking your laundry to the Laundromat. The best part is the ease of storage. I have bought so many over the years and these are by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Mahopac Falls NY

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold & store.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold & store when not in use. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T

customer_reviews.title: Large, sturdy, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: These are the sturdiest pop-up hampers I have ever purchased. They are large and have large openings on top. They are easy to carry, yet fit a large load or more of laundry. After a month, they are showing no signs of wear. I have already purchased another set.
customer_reviews.author: Holly OK

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that I bought these. They are reasonably priced, sturdy and I love that there is a pocket in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shamine Poynor

customer_reviews.title: Great. Just what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great. Just what i wanted. Sturdy, but flexible too. Only con is that the mesh tears kinda easy. (Dont have your kids play with your kitty in it and it should be fine)
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Parker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The straps are cheap, they broke after 2-3 trips to the laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these pop-up hampers
customer_reviews.text: Liking these hampers. It's nice to be able to load up and take 2 floors down into the basement. We also have big plastic laundry hampers that just don't do it for me, down the narrow stairs. They stand up in the bathroom or the corner of the bedroom, don't take up as much space as a regular laundry basket.
customer_reviews.author: Valbie

customer_reviews.title: They do the job
customer_reviews.text: These do the job, however they are smaller than I thought they would be and seem somewhat cheap (only a little better quality than a dollar store one I bought). No don't expect them to last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Lezlie Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Superior
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing several of these over the years for my 4 kids, this one is BY FAR the very best. Durable, well made, super sturdy!! Won’t buy any other brand!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Solid affordable laundry basket
customer_reviews.text: Good for home or for college use. Nice pocket to carry other things, easy to carry. My cats haven't destroyed them yet so pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Elliot Buster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy and look good. Love the side pocket
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality storage for my old clothes
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my closet to store old clothes and some blankets. They are pretty flexible and light but at the same time they feel sturdy enough. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: These hampers are cool to the cool cool
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome!! If you have limited space then these collapsible clothes hampers are what you need. When folded all the way down they are maybe a bit larger than a plate. But when they are opened up they are large enough to hold a surprisingly large amount of clothes. They even have areas on the sides to tote your detergent and bleach
customer_reviews.author: DerbyDudeDon

customer_reviews.title: Laundry has never been easier
customer_reviews.text: This product is so amazing to have in a college dorm. I've been using these a few times and what I can say is that laundry has been a breeze to me. When I'm not using this product, I fold it up and it takes up so little space.
customer_reviews.author: Konmari

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry hampers
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra laundry carrier - so I got these two so I could take one that holds my regular laundry and a second that could hold those extra blankets and comforters when I need to do that extra laundry. Both work wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ford Ballard, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Holds up to daily use. Easy to assemble. Holds laundry with no problem. Side pocket of convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Jr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been of good quality and no rips or tares. Easy to carry with big handles. 4 months later update. Entire side ripped and rendered the pop up hamper useless. See photographs.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Richards

customer_reviews.title: These things are great! Light
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! Light, durable, easy to carry. The frame springs into place when you unpack them from the surprisingly small box they come in. Side pockets hold soap or bleach if you have to tote your laundry from one place to another. They’re quite deep as well, so they hold a lot. One for whites and one for darks. Nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Durable for collapsible hampers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a couple of years ago and they have been durable. They were great assets while we were selling our house and moving. Good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: South Austin Girl

customer_reviews.title: Bigger on the inside
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a tiny little thing based on some of the reviews. Even after reading the dimensions! But it turns out, after you pop it open, it can hold a fair amount of laundry, perhaps one large load or two smaller ones. The description says it will hold more than I can carry. I'm certain I can carry quite a lot more than this, but I will let that slide since I really have no desire to carry that much laundry. I can't speak to the sturdiness yet. It was easy enough to refold but I couldn't get it to stay folded without using the handy little elastic that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Small opening
customer_reviews.text: The opening is small, makes it difficult to put already folded clothes in there. Even though the shape is square, on each of the cornercorner on the opening there is a piece of triangular fabric that covers it to make the opening round.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Mom

customer_reviews.title: Hard to twist to fold
customer_reviews.text: I like its structural but I don't understand how to fold it
customer_reviews.author: patty curry

customer_reviews.title: Quality hampers that I use in many ways: laundry, sorting clothes in proper order and other things
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, attractive and versatile. I just bought 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: JMG

customer_reviews.title: Handy.  Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: These is really handy and reasonably good quality. Gave one to my daughter for school and kept one for myself. I've used this hamper regularly and it has held up to regular use, including folding it up and down after each use. I'm tempted to get rid of my standard plastic hampers and use this exclusively for the space saving benefits of the product.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Very easy to use and convenient all around. It seems to fit more clothes than my regular hamper too!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Viovicente

customer_reviews.title: Great carriers
customer_reviews.text: These collapsible hampers are great and are well made. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jgreg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, spacious
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Perfect for carrying, holds about two batches of laundry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STORAGE MANIAC Pop-Up Mesh Clothes Hamper, 2- Pack is great deal.
customer_reviews.text: STORAGE MANIAC Foldable Laundry Hamper is not heavy, has high capacity, convenient for keeping laundry and is not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Vaisman

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Measurements were provided but I bought without double checking. These are smaller than I thought....
customer_reviews.author: Gail B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that this folds flat so I can pack it in a suitcase for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: SopranoNote

customer_reviews.title: Great & Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Extremely convenient, folds easily, stretches to hold quite a large load, very sturdy handles. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal and So Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I sent these off w college freshman last fall thinking one would rip, and second was backup. The first one NEVER ripped and was perfect coming home for summer. HIGHLY recommend these hampers for heavy loads or carrying odd items. Sending second college student off with his own set this fall. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Reott

customer_reviews.title: Love, love love - great size and it makes ...
customer_reviews.text: Love, love love - great size and it makes taking the laundry down two flights of stairs so much easier since I can literally carry​ both at the same time. I kept one for mysel and gave the other to my husband as a "hamper" I am so happy with this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie G63

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I cram all sorts of laundry into these and occasionally have a kid climb into them, bit they have held up with no noticeable holes. Plus they fold in half easily without all of the twisting. When folded, my 2.5 year olds can help and take them back upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best hampers I've ever had. They collapse when you need them to, and are very easy to carry. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolina

customer_reviews.title: Good for people with two story houses
customer_reviews.text: I got these on a two for one special. They are the perfect way to transport laundry from upstairs to my downstairs laundry room, so I can hold the handrail with one hand and the bag with the other. And when not in use, they pop back down to the size of a salad plate.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Vest

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Mesh hamper works exactly as expected. Great bargain for two
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great capacity, strong for hauling laundry up and down stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Tutu McByron

customer_reviews.title: Hampers are so helpful. Just right size...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these hampers from the "daily deal". They are just right. I carry one to the building laundry room and value the strength of the "handles".
customer_reviews.author: nancy m

customer_reviews.title: A must have item
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice for carrying and storing cloths for laundry. It has side pockets which can be used for separate storage of soaks or carry soap. It is also easy to fold and store away.It has also strong handle.
customer_reviews.author: Biniyam

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Durable.
customer_reviews.text: These portable hamper baskets are exactly as advertised. Very easy to manage.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for hamper use and to separate colored cloths for washing
customer_reviews.author: scribe

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality hampers
customer_reviews.text: These are quite sturdy and work well for me as clothes hampers. they are a little more than most but I would say they are much better quality than most as well. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David2051

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and camping
customer_reviews.text: These are great little hampers, I will probably be ordering another set or two. I take these on our camping trips since they fold up so nice and small, I also use them to sort laundry types on heavy laundry weeks.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOve, love love these. They hold up great.!! Just like described, hold their shape, a couple loads of laundry and hangers. Handles are good and don't. Break like others. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Holds a ton of laundry, easy to pack up and take on trips, small footprint.
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and big enough to handle a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and big enough to handle a lot of cloths. Makes going to the laundry a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: David J Cavallero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great. A fine, inexpensive solution to sorting whites and colors, then carrying them to the washer/drier.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry. Use it to carry laundry to the laundry room.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This Mesh Hamper with handles makes it much safer carrying the laundry down the stairs to the laundry room.

customer_reviews.title: Open & collapse easily
customer_reviews.text: They function like they're supposed to ... which is more than one can say of many products. They collapse and open up easily.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Definitely better than the folding canvas cardboard ones.

product_meta.title: STORAGE MANIAC Pop-Up Mesh Clothes Hamper, Foldable Laundry Hamper, Side Pocket|Durable Handles|Enlarged Opening, 2- Pack
feature_bullets: LARGE CAPACITY - 2 portable mesh laundry hampers, each hamper measures 14.17 x 14.17 x 22.83 inches when open, holds more than you can carry; measures 9.1 X 8 X 3.1 inches when closed, it could be slipped into a side pocket of a backpack, a basket or into a drawer without taking up much space

WOVEN TAPE HANDLES - Handles are WOVEN TAPE which providing a sound support for the bag when it is full of clothes. Each handle is reinforced and attached to the hamper with extra-strength stitching so the hamper can handle a heavy load
ENLARGED OPENING - We have improved the size of opening. The LARGER top opening is easier to put and take items
COLLAPSIBLE - Spring wire frame is easy to collapse for storage. When not in use, simply twist the hamper by your hands and fold the whole unit flat
SIDE POCKET - Side pocket gives ample extra storage space for laundry accessories like detergent, dryer sheets, stain removers, or delicates, socks, and other personal items
